name: forgy-platform
description: Plataforma Forgy - App de Ejercicios con Prisma ORM

scripts.setup: npm install && npm run install:all && npm run db:init
scripts.install:all: concurrently "cd forgy_backend_api && npm install" "cd forgy_mobile_app && npm install"
scripts.db:init: cd forgy_backend_api && docker compose up -d && node -e "setTimeout(() => console.log('✅ DB Lista'), 5000)" && npx prisma migrate deploy && npx prisma generate
scripts.db:reset: npm run db:stop && npm run db:init
scripts.clean: npx rimraf node_modules package-lock.json forgy_backend_api/node_modules forgy_backend_api/package-lock.json forgy_backend_api/dist forgy_mobile_app/node_modules forgy_mobile_app/package-lock.json
